title: On the Laplace-type transform and its applications
authors: Slobodan B. Tri\v{c}kovi\'c, Miomir S. Stankovi\'c
abstract:
We make use of the Laplace transform and gamma function to construct a new
integral transform having the property of mapping a derivative to the backward
difference, whence we derive a method for solving difference equations and,
relying on classical orthogonal polynomials, for obtaining combinatorial
identities. A table of some basic functions is given in the Appendix.
